## Attach packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

## Data time
```{r}
# read in 
stl_lead <- read_csv(here::here("data", "stl_blood_lead.csv"))
names(stl_lead)

# clean names
stl_lead <- stl_lead %>% clean_names()
names(stl_lead)

# basic summary stats
skimr::skim(stl_lead)
```

```{r}
# using dplyr to create a new column
stl_lead %>% dplyr::mutate(prop_white = white /total_pop)
```
